title: Lunar Revel Shop 2016 Gone
body: Ok, so my lunar revel shop isn't there. I can't even click the button to take me to my own personal shop. I wanted to buy this vel'koz skin, but because the shop isn't there, I can't buy it cheaper. Can you guys fix this so I can buy my skins. Thanks for your help.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it!
My shop is there but it won't load at all. All my friends will load though.
Have you tried rebooting your client? Is it not loading every time you log in?
It doesn't load every time. I even try my brother's computer still won't work. But his shop will work
Gotcha. Thanks for the additional information. We've seen a few other rare cases of this occurring and are looking into it.
